G

GameEngine - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3
This class represents a game engine, which works with MemoryUI by returning responses to the requests from the user interface.
GameEngine() - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.GameEngine
This is the default constructor for the class, which assigns 0 to GameEngine.moveCount and creates the Grid.
gameIsRunning() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.GameEngine
This method checks every Card in the Grid every turn, which keeps the game running if at least one Card isn't null.
getCards() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.Grid
This methods simply returns the list of cards.
getGrid() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.GameEngine
This method responds to the MemoryUI with by giving it GameEngine.grid for purposes of displaying the Grid to the screen.
getLayout() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.Grid
This method returns the two-dimensional layout of the Grid.
getMoveCount() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.GameEngine
This method responds to the MemoryUI with the value of GameEngine.moveCount for purposes of displaying it to the screen.
getSymbol() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.Card
This method simply returns the value of Card.symbol for purposes of displaying it along the rows and columns of a Grid.
Grid - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3
This class represents the Grid that will display all Cards face-down and assign them a number based on their order in the layout of the grid (Grid.gridLayout).
Grid() - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_3.Grid
This is the default constructor for the class, which develops the Grid.gridLayout and initialize the Grid.cards.
